data.title: Herman Brood & His Wild Romance

data.meta_description: Stay Alive Lyrics by Herman Brood & His Wild Romance. Now, listen to all your favourite songs, along with the lyrics, only on JioSaavn.
data.text:
Late afternoon Fridaynight is almost there Washing dishes from McDonalds The money aint wild but i don′t care Workin' the street Hot enough to make you stop and stare I ve never been to Paris But somehow i just don′t care You gotta do it with soul Do it from the heart To make a fortune You ve gotta be smart Feelin'your bones Mellow in the rain People try to vain The psychedelics of my brain Gotta get up Gotta move out Got to try and hide Gotta get inside Gotta survive I'm a rat in a mace First blood crossing my face Gotta stay alive I′m gonna stay alive You ve gotta to hit If you wanna make it roll Stay ahead of the mob You gotta score if you wanna keep up whith your blood brothers at the top gotta leave this town got a guitar make a million and live in L.A. gotta stay on the scene, aint gonna fade away gotta get up gotta move out got to feel the drive got to survive got to get up got to survive got to stay alive i′m gonna stay alive i'm gonna be in the army i′m gonna be a G.I. gonna be in the Navy gonna be alright all these good looking officers taking care of me all these well dressed officers take good care of me When your too fast Your gonna miss the smell Too slow Your gonna live in hell Gotta get up Gotta move out Gotta feel the drive Got to survive Feel my body mellow in the rain Gotta stay alive I'm gonna stay alive She′s taking double Scotsch for breakfast Just another excess I'd better say yes To the smell of succes She′s cabled like an idiot Drinking Gin in the sun I'd try to steal her jewels But i got away with none Got to get up Got to move out Got to survive Got to stay alive I'm a rat in a mace First blood crossing my face Gotta stay alive I′m gonna stay alive Writer(s): Hermanus Brood, Rose Angelo
